text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/928eec649b8af389de0fdb7aba2034d27df3e058|patch 8.2.0856: CTRL-S stops output>
patch 8.2.0856: CTRL-S stops output

Problem:    CTRL-S stops output.
Solution:   Invert the IXON flag. (closes #6166)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0856: CTRL-S stops output · vim/vim@928eec6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0856: CTRL-S stops output · vim/vim@928eec6
attachments.text: Problem: CTRL-S stops output. Solution: Invert the IXON flag. (closes #6166)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5cd1cb9ff9d04979ff4cbc36ca8416d83364505d|patch 8.2.0857: GTK cell height can be a pixel too much>
patch 8.2.0857: GTK cell height can be a pixel too much

Problem:    GTK cell height can be a pixel too much.
Solution:   Subtract 3 instead of 1 when rounding. (closes #6168)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0857: GTK cell height can be a pixel too much · vim/vim@5cd1cb9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0857: GTK cell height can be a pixel too much · vim/vim@5cd1cb9
attachments.text: Problem: GTK cell height can be a pixel too much. Solution: Subtract 3 instead of 1 when rounding. (closes #6168)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/aaad995f8384a77a64efba6846c9c4ac99de0953|patch 8.2.0860: cannot use CTRL-A and CTRL-X on unsigned numbers>
patch 8.2.0860: cannot use CTRL-A and CTRL-X on unsigned numbers

Problem:    Cannot use CTRL-A and CTRL-X on unsigned numbers.
Solution:   Add "unsigned" to 'nrformats'. (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #6144)

patch 8.2.0861: cannot easily get all the current marks

Problem:    Cannot easily get all the current marks.
Solution:   Add getmarklist(). (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6032)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b10090928cb5283f867e8457b7eea0985470d8d4|patch 8.2.0862: ":term ++curwin" makes the current buffer hidden>
patch 8.2.0862: ":term ++curwin" makes the current buffer hidden

Problem:    ":term ++curwin" makes the current buffer hidden. (Harm te
            Hennepe)
Solution:   Do not hide the current buffer. (closes #6170)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0862: ":term ++curwin" makes the current buffer hidden · vim/vim@b100909
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0862: ":term ++curwin" makes the current buffer hidden · vim/vim@b100909
attachments.text: Problem: ":term ++curwin" makes the current buffer hidden. (Harm te Hennepe) Solution: Do not hide the current buffer. (closes #6170)

patch 8.2.0863: cannot set a separate color for underline/undercurl

Problem:    Cannot set a separate color for underline/undercurl.
Solution:   Add the t_AU and t_8u termcap codes. (Timur Celik, closes #6011)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/06b7b58455f9c09be3d1c36d174ffbfdf4efcd79|patch 8.2.0848: MS-Windows: the Windows terminal code has some flaws>
patch 8.2.0848: MS-Windows: the Windows terminal code has some flaws

Problem:    MS-Windows: the Windows terminal code has some flaws.
Solution:   Do not redraw the right edge of the screen.  Remove the background
            color trick.  Flush the screen output buffer often.  (Nobuhiro
            Takasaki, #5546)

patch 8.2.0852: cannot map CTRL-S on some systems

Problem:    Cannot map CTRL-S on some systems.
Solution:   Do not use CTRL-S for flow control.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ca70c07b72c24aae3d141e67d08f50361f051af5|patch 8.2.0853: ml_delete() often called with FALSE argument>
patch 8.2.0853: ml_delete() often called with FALSE argument

Problem:    ml_delete() often called with FALSE argument.
Solution:   Use ml_delete_flags(x, ML_DEL_MESSAGE) when argument is TRUE.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/363d6148dfc2cc17fb0d286c7a36c305f56f5813|patch 8.2.0854: xxd cannot show offset as a decimal number>
patch 8.2.0854: xxd cannot show offset as a decimal number

Problem:    Xxd cannot show offset as a decimal number.
Solution:   Add the "-d" flag. (Aapo Rantalainen, closes #5616

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0854: xxd cannot show offset as a decimal number · vim/vim@363d614
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0854: xxd cannot show offset as a decimal number · vim/vim@363d614
attachments.text: Problem: Xxd cannot show offset as a decimal number. Solution: Add the "-d" flag. (Aapo Rantalainen, closes #5616

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ebe9d34aa07037cff2188a8dd424ee1f59cbb0bf|patch 8.2.0855: GUI tests fail because the test doesn't use a modifier>
patch 8.2.0855: GUI tests fail because the test doesn't use a modifier

Problem:    GUI tests fail because the test doesn't use a modifier.
Solution:   Add "\{xxx}" to be able to encode a modifier.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0855: GUI tests fail because the test doesn't use a modifier · vim/vim@ebe9d34
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0855: GUI tests fail because the test doesn't use a modifier · vim/vim@ebe9d34
attachments.text: Problem: GUI tests fail because the test doesn't use a modifier. Solution: Add "\{xxx}" to be able to encode a modifier.
